intro: A fun and addictive platforming experience from start to finish!
description:
Take control of a brave carrot on a mission to protect its territory in this exciting pixel art platformer. Face challenging enemies and obstacles, using powerful punches, double jumps, and the Dash to overcome action-packed, precise levels.

With fast-paced gameplay, responsive controls, and appealing retro visuals, Carrot Smash delivers a fun and addictive platforming experience from start to finish.

Features:
- Precision platforming with intense action
- Use punches, double jumps, and the Dash to defeat enemies
- Challenging levels full of traps and obstacles
- Charming Pixel Art visual style
- Engaging and energetic soundtrack
